channel.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
channel.description:
(There is a slight chance that this problem is somehow caused by myself, altough I doubt it.)
Fucking Microsoft! I use Chrome, as it is way better in my eyes then FF, and especially IE. But that doesnt matter here: it's about Hotmail/Windows live. For those who use it, you might have noticed that it's updated. It not only looks even more gay then it already did, then also deleted a few functions. You can't use the top bar to search in your emails anymore, but on top of that: it has lost it's compatibility with Chrome. I can't even type a fucking email. So now I have to type my emails in FF!
As you've read in the firste sentence, there is a possibility that it's my fault somehow. If it is, excuse me for my rage and please tell me what I have to do to fix it.

item.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

I have Office 07 and I love the Ribbon interface, its all based on opinion.

Read full topic
item.source: Gay Microsoft took it too far

item.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“boriz, post:20, topic:241287”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=317611.msg2519603#msg2519603 date=1225820800]
(There is a slight chance that this problem is somehow caused by myself, altough I doubt it.)

Fucking Microsoft! I use Chrome, as it is way better in my eyes then FF, and especially IE. But that doesnt matter here: it’s about Hotmail/Windows live. For those who use it, you might have noticed that it’s updated. It not only looks even more gay then it already did, then also deleted a few functions. You can’t use the top bar to search in your emails anymore, but on top of that: it has lost it’s compatibility with Chrome. I can’t even type a fucking email. So now I have to type my emails in FF!

As you’ve read in the firste sentence, there is a possibility that it’s my fault somehow. If it is, excuse me for my rage and please tell me what I have to do to fix it.
[/quote]

Good sir, you fail right there by using hotmail. Gmail is better.

The only good products Microsoft has ever made were MS Office 2007 and XP. I can’t find anything else that Microsoft made that I enjoy.

Google chrome is nice but it’s shit at the same time. No adblock plugins, too many exploits, and I don’t think it looks “cool” at all. It’s just more compact than unmodified FF.[/quote]Even office 2007 was a pile of crap cos of the gay interface. 2003 was good, but i converted to OpenOffice cos its 999x faster.

Read full topic
item.source: Gay Microsoft took it too far

item.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

That’s how gay microsoft is.

Read full topic
item.source: Gay Microsoft took it too far

item.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:27, topic:241287”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=317611.msg2519849#msg2519849 date=1225829668]

MITB: IIRC, you can forward your emails. Your right, you can only forward them to a different live adress.

It’s really odd. I can get to the page where you write your email, and I can even put the receiver and the subject. I can even send an email, but the only thing that doesnt work is the text area where you write the email itself. It looks deactivated.

Use some javascript hack to forward to gmail
[/quote]You can’t use JavaScript to do that. The server checks all requests.

I just tried forwarding from Hotmail to Gmail - and it works fine. So I don’t get what you’re hyped up about.[/quote]

How did you do that?

Read full topic
item.source: Gay Microsoft took it too far

item.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:26, topic:241287”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=317611.msg2521716#msg2521716 date=1225911399]

It’s quite smart of them to keep their things in beta. You don’t have to provide support for products that are in beta.

Is the google search engine in Beta? I do not see any support for that.
[/quote]
Its not, but since it free you don’t get support, but I hope you don’t need support to use the search engine.[/quote]

I don’t. But I was pointing out there is no support.

Read full topic
item.source: Gay Microsoft took it too far

It’s really odd. I can get to the page where you write your email, and I can even put the receiver and the subject. I can even send an email, but the only thing that doesnt work is the text area where you write the email itself. It looks deactivated.
[/quote]

Use some javascript hack to forward to gmail[/quote]You can’t use JavaScript to do that. The server checks all requests.

I just tried forwarding from Hotmail to Gmail - and it works fine. So I don’t get what you’re hyped up about.

item.title: Gay Microsoft took it too far
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:241287”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=317611.msg2519707#msg2519707 date=1225824416]
I’ll just forward my hotmail emails to Gmail.
[/quote]

Good luck, if you figure out how can you tell me? As far is I know hotmail won’t let you.

And if you use beta software, expect this kind of stuff to happen, stick with firefox at least until chrome is stable…[/quote]
The most of the things Google have made is still in beta, even Gmail.
So just wait 10 years and maybe Chrome is out of beta.

item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:15, topic:241287”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=317611.msg2520068#msg2520068 date=1225835369]
If you want to use hotmail, install the Live Mail desktop client. Way better than the shitty web interface.
[/quote]
Hotmail doesn’t work with the one that comes with vista.[/quote]
I’m not talking about the one that comes with vista, I’m talking about this. It works just fine with hotmail.

Fucking Microsoft! I use Chrome, as it is way better in my eyes then FF, and especially IE. But that doesnt matter here: it’s about Hotmail/Windows live. For those who use it, you might have noticed that it’s updated. It not only looks even more gay then it already did, then also deleted a few functions. You can’t use the top bar to search in your emails anymore, but on top of that: it has lost it’s compatibility with Chrome. I can’t even type a fucking email. So now I have to type my emails in FF!

As you’ve read in the firste sentence, there is a possibility that it’s my fault somehow. If it is, excuse me for my rage and please tell me what I have to do to fix it.

The only good products Microsoft has ever made were MS Office 2007 and XP. I can’t find anything else that Microsoft made that I enjoy.

Google chrome is nice but it’s shit at the same time. No adblock plugins, too many exploits, and I don’t think it looks “cool” at all. It’s just more compact than unmodified FF.[/quote]
You fail for using Gmail. Get your own domain/server and set up your own email.
